definitions.text: a physical condition in which there is a disturbance of normal functioning
examples: the doctor prescribed some medicine for the disorder
everyone gets stomach upsets from time to time

definitions.text: a condition in which things are not in their expected places
examples: the files are in complete disorder

definitions.text: a disturbance of the peace or of public order
disturb in mind or make uneasy or cause to be worried or alarmed
examples: She was rather perturbed by the news that her father was seriously ill
